It acknowledges the application of digital technologies for path-breaking achievements and front-running tech innovations that help Shell transition to a net-zero emissions energy business. Shell.ai is a change programme which is designed to support the adoption of digital technologies at scale across Shell.

94894d66-565d-4e47-b99f-16f9f474f3cc.description: Citizen Development also known as DIY within Shell celebrates the use of low code/no code tools to deploy digital solutions. The DIY Hero title recognises Digital Innovators and DIY Developers who are domain experts with unique ‘digital’ skills to unlock value from data utilizing the approved DIY framework and toolkit.
94894d66-565d-4e47-b99f-16f9f474f3cc.name: Shell.ai Awards 2022|DIY Hero Category - Winner

6ff0c695-d654-4aa6-a565-3493cf60a151.description: The 'Citizen Development Pioneer' category recognises ambassadors of our citizen software developers programme, who deliver value and demonstrate strong leadership and an innovative approach to solving problems with digital tools.
6ff0c695-d654-4aa6-a565-3493cf60a151.name: Shell.ai Awards 2021|Citizen Development Pioneers Category - Winner

badge_template_activities.title: The Shell.ai Awards celebrate our colleagues who think and dream big to take Shell’s digital transformation to the next level. It acknowledges the application of digital technologies for path-breaking achievements and front-running tech innovations that help Shell transition to a net-zero emissions energy business. Shell.ai is a change programme which is designed to support the adoption of digital technologies at scale across Shell.

Annemiek te Boekhorst won in this category for being an early ambassador of citizen development in Shell. She led her team in the development of an innovative furnace trimming application for Shell Moerdijk, a chemicals plant in the Netherlands. This bespoke application enables significant reduction in costs and energy consumption at this site.

223ee785-6d95-4418-abe6-78c8ac449f1e.description: The ‘Rising Star in AI’ category recognises the achievements of innovators who have jumpstarted their AI career and excelled in it. It also acknowledges individuals who helped foster and develop AI talent at Shell.
223ee785-6d95-4418-abe6-78c8ac449f1e.name: Shell.ai Awards 2021|Rising Star in AI Category - Runner Up

badge_template_activities.title: The Shell.ai Awards celebrate our colleagues who think and dream big to take Shell’s digital transformation to the next level. It acknowledges the application of digital technologies for path-breaking achievements and front-running tech innovations that help Shell transition to a net-zero emissions energy business. Shell.ai is a change programme which is designed to support the adoption of digital technologies at scale across Shell.

Robin Balyan led the software architecture design and the build out of the foundational elements of an application which will transform safety in assets. This application demonstrates the feasibility of using Machine Vision, the Internet of Things and wearable devices to alert workers of potential “line of fire” hazards.

4300ae40-c264-4c47-9bf4-52235728012d.description: The ‘Shell.ai Champion’ category recognises individuals who have gone above and beyond their roles to leverage, promote and improve digital technologies to create value for Shell.
4300ae40-c264-4c47-9bf4-52235728012d.name: Shell.ai Awards 2021|Shell.ai Champion

badge_template_activities.title: The Shell.ai Awards celebrate our colleagues who think and dream big to take Shell’s digital transformation to the next level. It acknowledges the application of digital technologies for path-breaking achievements and front-running tech innovations that help Shell transition to a net-zero emissions energy business. Shell.ai is a change programme which is designed to support the adoption of digital technologies at scale across Shell.

Saptarshi Das was recognised as a 'Shell.ai Champion' for his passion for applying digital for a more sustainable and affordable energy future system. He has successfully led teams in running several open innovation challenges building new partnerships for Shell. Saptarshi is also acknowledged as a great mentor, empowering colleagues to bring their best to the work they do.
